title: I Call Them Shrolls
post:
Let’s focus on this lost comment by Haqodeshim, and think of what it illustrates.
“…VP-8 image analyser […] a computer built for our planetary exploration…”
This is from Russ Breault in the video inserted in the comment.
NASA is a magic word for public outreach. Mix up NASA with the Shroud of Turin and you get a fantasy factory.
https://shroudstory.com/2014/03/30/nasa-had-nothing-to-do-with-it/
author: anoxie
